title: Love and Drugs on the Street: Girls Sleeping Rough
overview: In Brighton and Hove, where there's been the UK's biggest increase in homelessness over the past year, we meet Paige (pictured) who is 21 and sleeps in a graveyard; Tanya, who is seven months pregnant and sleeps rough with her partner; and Jo-Jo, who is 21, smoking spice and sleeping in shop doorways.
